title: Sin Gaming vs Dire Wolves - Tonight at 7pm AEDT
body:
After Dire Wolves' victory over the Chiefs 2 weeks ago and taking the OPL Legend title off the Season 2015 Champions, they are put to the test tonight against Sin, who are looking at continuing their momentum after their recent win against Trident. This is Dire Wolves' first defense of the title.

We spoke to the Junglers and learned their thoughts on the game. Juves, Sin's Jungler, was a focus point as both teams seem to be looking there as a potential weakness or strength.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZBHikPLcK1A

What do you guys think, will SIN take the title off the current holders Dire Wolves, or will the Dire Wolves retain?

replies.body: I want that title Dire Wolves so you better not lose!
Remind me never to tell Sybol what rank I am...

It's just a phase you're going through - only temporary.


Like Spawn's beard.

> Remind me never to tell Sybol what rank I am...

Aw. You could do well. I think. Maybe. Eh. I don't know.

SIN have it in them if they can get a good draft. I think Bencel has done well with the boys and I hope that it can transfer into the game tonight. I feel the only way that DIRE WOLFS can win is if they decide to pick up the {{champion:6}}

Dire Wolves to retain
Also. Really love that I am the only NA person on this thread. Just shows the dedication to OPL.
All aboard the DW Hype Train!
